Index.infoText: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating modern, scalable web applications with clean code and great user experience.
Index.aboutDescription1: Hi, I'm a Full Stack Engineer with {years} years of experience in HTML, CSS, React, and Node.js. I enjoy using creativity and technology to make user-friendly websites. I'm good at solving tough problems and creating scalable apps.
Index.aboutDescription2: I'm always eager to learn and keep up with industry trends. I work well in teams and believe in clear communication. I'm excited to contribute my skills and passion to your development team.
Index.subject: Subject
Index.footerText: Coded in Visual Studio Code. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, deployed with Vercel & AWS
